TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaMinExclusiveFacet extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaFacet

Docs.summary: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C). This class can be used to specify a restriction on the minimum value of a element. The element value must be greater than the value of the element.
